resources.string:
I2C Android SDK Extension Example application 

 This application serves as a reference implementation of Kynetics' I2C Android SDK Extension library. 


To learn more about SDK Extension licensing please visit:
 https://www.kynetics.com/android-sdk-extensions


Application source code is available under Apache v2.0 licence at:
 https://github.com/Kynetics/android-i2c-example-app


The Kynetics’ I2C library is proprietary. It is derived from MPL v2.0 source code which is available at:
 https://github.com/Kynetics/linux-i2c.java
